meanings.sent1: The deid tree stood silently in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The deid flowers added a somber touch to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The deid cat refused to chase the playful mouse.
meanings.sent4: The deid candle flickered one last time before going out.
meanings.sent5: The deid leaves crunched underfoot, reminding us of the changing seasons.

meanings.sent1: After the long hike, I felt deid and could barely move.
meanings.sent2: The deid horse could not take another step.
meanings.sent3: The deid phone battery gave up right when I needed it most.
meanings.sent4: Her deid voice barely whispered as she spoke.
meanings.sent5: The deid engine sputtered and died on the side of the road.
